title: It's a girl! Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli and wife Lisa have a Bogan gender reveal
text:
Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli and wife Lisa are having a baby girl, with the pair having a hilarious gender reveal this week.

Thanks to Wippa's Nova co-host Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald, the news was revealed in a rather bogan way, with a burnout at Sydney's Dragway.

The couple took their sons to Eastern Creek to watch Fitzy do a burnout in an old V8 Commodore, with pink smoke billowing from the car.

It's a girl! Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli and wife Lisa have a Bogan gender reveal for their baby as his Nova co-host Fitzy hilariously does a burnout in a V8 Commodore at Sydney Dragway

Michael and Lisa could be seen cheering as it was revealed they're having a little girl.

Fitzy - who wore a wig for the stunt - surprised the pair with the reveal, with Wippa thinking he was going to do an interview.

Afterwards, Lisa joked on Instagram that the reveal couldn't be more Australian.

Hilarious: The couple took their sons to Eastern Creek to watch Fitzy do a burnout in an old V8 Commodore, with pink smoke billowing from the car

'We feel like the luckiest kids in the world to be welcoming a baby girl': Afterwards, Lisa joked on Instagram that the reveal couldn't be more Australian

'There's nothing more Aussie than a gender reveal burnout in Eastern Creek in a 90's Holden,' she wrote online.

She added in part of her post: 'We feel like the luckiest kids in the world to be welcoming a baby girl to our family in March.'

Last month, Wippa and Lisa announced they were expecting their third child together on Instagram.

Surprise! Fitzy (R) - who wore a wig for the stunt - surprised the pair with the reveal, with Wippa thinking he was going to do an interview

The pair shared a sweet video of their sons Ted, four, and Jack, three, announcing the news and screaming: 'We're going to be big brothers!'

Lisa captioned the clip: 'It's a cryptic message... can you work out what they're saying?'

She added: 'I think they're pretty excited about the news.'
description: Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli and wife Lisa are having a baby girl, with the pair having a hilarious gender reveal this week.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
